desc: The L.O.L. Surprise! Subscription Box ships every season with custom-made exclusive L.O.L. Surprise! goodies that you can’t get anywhere else. This mystery subscription box includes limited edition items such as apparel, accessories, toys, dolls, and more. Subscribe online to start unboxing special #LOLBox deliveries.

layout.text: The summer box theme is all about traveling! Subscribe today to get a box full of L.O.L. Surprise! goodies for your next vacay!
